TopicTitle: Remote Tech 2 and TAC Lifesupport Processor Tax

Articles.Content:
Running vanilla KSP after the recent optimization has been smooth as silk and my PC does not even heat up after tons of play.

With remote tech 2 and TAC life support my poor PC starts to heat up quick and will suffer if I play for very long.

Does anyone else get this problem? Is there a leak in either of these mods or are they especially taxing?

I love them both and wish I could use them without killing my PC....
